title: Untitled

This release version is outdated! Find the current version
here
.
Release LTS.461.3 of June 30, 2025
New features
It is now possible to spell-check using browser tools when entering text in the
string
/
text
attribute field.
The
"Key Indicators" dashboard analytics
now supports
Drill Down decryption
.
When creating
custom action
, it is now possible to use the "Add files to attribute" UI module.
It is now possible to customize the result of e-signature verification.
It is now possible to check the contents of the update file for prohibited data.
In
audit
, the ability to track principal actions by
user privilege
level is now available.
A setting for adjusting the page margins of a document was implemented.
Changes and improvements
The process of selecting values in radiobutton using hotkeys was debugged.
The display of existing relations with dashboards when
deleting
the data source was debugged.
The logic of automatic generation of the table name/field for the table when
creating
an object type or attribute was improved
Switching between tabs in
tab group
and in the
"Tab Management"
widget was stabilized.
The copying process using
set for copying attributes
was debugged.
The display of object attributes by the selected attribute of the object in the
"Choose instance type field"
setting was stabilized.
The column selection process in the copied
object registry
was stabilized.
Display of scroll bar in advanced registry search was improved.
The process of deleting registry pinned in
object attribute options
was debugged.
The mapping of virtual columns in the child attribute registry was stabilized.
The ability to filter data using a data source with parameters was debugged.
The loading of an object with a built-in registry with configured filtering based on SQL with parameters was stabilized.
Now the
default visual
got from
update file
is applied to the object being updated via GUF.
The display of a child attribute with the "MultiLinkLocalObject" visual is stabilized according to the specified visibility algorithm.
The display of buttons in the
"Search filters"
compact widget type was debugged.
The default values were added to the settings of
"Button" widget
.
The locking algorithm applied to the
“Date range”
widget was debugged.
Creating an object profile through the
kanban-board
stage was simplified.
The ability to create a
subject area
based on a template from
GreenData marketplace
was stabilized.
In the
objectsWithOptions
function, passing necessary parameters to the “filterSource” method was improved.
Modal window naming when calling the
var
function was adjusted.
Vulnerabilities when working with algorithms in the browser part of the application were fixed.
The newExcelWorkbook function was debugged.
Algorithm execution using the
getselected
function via the
actions
button located on the
dashboard
was stabilized.
The ability to save
start page
with no linking to an object after changing the principals composition of the “Who can see” section was debugged.
The possibility of excluding a user from an administrative group was debugged.
The ability to save
start page
without relation with object was debugged after changing the composition of the subjects of the "Who can see" section.
Checking of
permissions for type attributes
was stabilized.
The display of condition names in the
permissions for type attributes
registry was debugged.
Route update on task completion was debugged.
The processing of subprocess termination signals when there are several versions of signals with the same name was debugged.
The process of performing the “Reporting consolidation wizard” action was stabilized.
Display of values of indicators involved in balance check algorithms was debugged.
Hiding the value of a custom token after saving an object was stabilized.
The ability to get
list of updates in the platform
by clicking on
was debugged.
The update installation process with the parameters for connecting to the
Apache Kafka
message
queue was stabilized.
Integration with Mango Office for recording call was improved.
File upload via the ETL process with active flags of asynchrony was debugged.
Checking for available
CI/CD
updates was stabilized.
Tab names when selecting objects to build updates and the default visual when searching by object type was adjusted and the object type registry was set.
Xml file processing vulnerabilities were fixed.
The file signing key length was increased to 2048 bytes.
The service administrator authentication process is now audited only during application startup for all server processes.
The logic of creating user session records in the audit when executing system processes was improved.
The system actions log now records the object id for which tasks are started.
Scrolling when working with a document was improved.
The  generation of a printed form file when copying content from another source was stabilized.
The visibility algorithms execution after updating values from sources was debugged.
The display of color fill in a row without symbols in the printed form file was stabilized.
In
mobile app system settings
, the icon for the “Tasks” menu item was changed.
File scrolling in
GreenData Meet
was improved.
